2030, Indonesia Akan Jadi Lima Besar Pasar Game Global
05 Nov 2019, 09:56 by Ai Rika Rachmawati
 
BANDUNG, (PR).- Indonesia diprediksi akan menjadi lima besar pasar game secara global pada 2030. Revenue game di Indonesia pada periode tersebut diprediksi akan mencapai 4,3 miliar dolar Amerika Serikat (AS). 
Group Head of Marketing LinkAja, Ignatius Untung, mengatakan, salah satu pendorong utamanya adalah jaringan internet Indonesia yang semakin baik. Apalagi, pada akhir tahun ini seluruh wilayah Indonesia ditargetkan sudah terjangkau jaringan 4G.
"Pasar game Indonesia akan tumbuh semakin pesat. Penetrasi game terus meningkat, baik yangberbayar maupun free," tuturnya.
Seperti diketahui, saat ini hanya sebagian kecil wilayah Indonesia yang belum terjangkau layanan data. Bahkan, berdasarkan data Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi (Kemenkominfo), per Februari sebanyak 82,36% desa di Indonesia sudah terhubung layanan 4G. 
Pada 2021 pun Indonesia diprediksi sudah akan menjadi pasar terbesar game di Kawasan Asia Tenggara. Pasar game Indonesia pada periode tersebut diprediksi akan mencapai 1,82 miliar dolar Amerika Serikat (AS).
"Industri game Indonesia tumbuh 25%-30% per tahun. Dengan nilai tersebut, pasar Indonesia bahkan jauh lebih besar dari India," tuturnya.
Data Badan Ekonomi Kreatif (Bekraf) menyebutkan, pada 2017 pasar game Indonesia diprediksi baru mencapai 882 juta dolar AS. Nilai tersebut naik sekitar 200 juta dolar AS dibandingkan tahun sebelumnya.
Jumlah gamer di Indonesia saat ini diprediksi sudah mencapai 34 juta orang. Dari jumlah tersebut, 19,9 juta di antaranya adalah gamer online berbayar dan rata-rata pengeluarannya mencapai 9,12 dolar Amerika Serikat (AS).
 
Layanan pembayaran
Kian menanjaknya pasar game di Indonesia, menurut Ignatius, juga turut mendorong peningkatan kebutuhan layanan transaksi digital untuk pembayaran voucher game online. Pencinta game membutuhkan layanan pembayaran digital yang mudah dan praktis.
Besarnya potensi tersebut, menurut dia, mendorong LinkAja menghadirkan fitur pembelian voucher game online. Keberadaan fitur tersebut, menurut dia, juga diproyeksikan untuk meningkatkan kebiasaan masyarakat dalam bertransaksi secara digital
"Untuk menyosialisasikan transaksi nontunai LinkAja bagi para pecinta game online, beberapa waktu lalu kami menggelar Turnamen game online Free Fire," ujarnya.
Bandung menjadi kota terakhir perhelatan  turnamen tersebut, yaitu pada 26 Oktober. Sebelumnya turnamen tersebut sudah digelar di Jakarta pada 6 Agustus dan Yogyakarta pada 28 September. ***

2030, Indonesia Will Become the Top Five Global Game Market
05 Nov 2019, 09:56 by Ai Rika Rachmawati

BANDUNG, (PR) .- Indonesia is predicted to become the top five global game market in 2030. Revenue games in Indonesia in that period are predicted to reach 4.3 billion US dollars (US).
LinkAja's Head of Marketing Group, Ignatius Untung, said, one of the main drivers was Indonesia's increasingly good internet network. Moreover, by the end of this year, all regions of Indonesia are targeted to have been reached by the 4G network.
"The Indonesian game market will grow more rapidly. Game penetration continues to increase, both paid and free," he said.
As is known, currently only a small part of Indonesia is not yet reached by data services. In fact, based on data from the Ministry of Communication and Information (Kemenkominfo), as of February, as many as 82.36% of villages in Indonesia were connected to 4G services.
In 2021, Indonesia is predicted to become the largest gaming market in the Southeast Asian Region. The Indonesian game market in that period is predicted to reach 1.82 billion US dollars (US).
"The Indonesian gaming industry is growing 25% -30% per year. With this value, the Indonesian market is even bigger than India," he said.
Data from the Creative Economy Agency (Bekraf) states that in 2017 the Indonesian gaming market is predicted to reach 882 million US dollars. This value increased by around 200 million US dollars compared to the previous year.
The number of gamers in Indonesia is currently predicted to have reached 34 million people. Of these, 19.9 million of them are paid online gamers and the average expenditure reached 9.12 US dollars (US).

Payment service
The increasingly rising game market in Indonesia, according to Ignatius, also helped drive the need for digital transaction services for online game voucher payments. Game lovers need digital payment services that are easy and practical.
The great potential, according to him, encourages LinkAja to bring online game voucher purchase features. The existence of these features, according to him, is also projected to improve people's habits in digital transactions
"To socialize LinkAja non-cash transactions for online game lovers, some time ago we held the Free Fire online game Tournament," he said.
Bandung became the last city of the tournament, which was on October 26. Previously the tournament had been held in Jakarta on 6 August and Yogyakarta on 28 September. ***
